chapter_description.p: The audio module provides functions for reading, writing, analyzing, and playing audio files.
It supports playback control through the audioplayer object, manipulation of playback properties, and metadata handling.
It also includes utilities for signal conversion and sound generation.

keyword.name: audioplayer_fieldnames
keyword.description: Returns the properties name of an audioplayer object.

keyword.name: audioplayer_get
keyword.description: Get property value from audioplayer interface.

keyword.name: audioplayer_set
keyword.description: Set object or interface property to specified value.

keyword.name: audioplayer_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used audioplayer handle.

keyword.name: isplaying
keyword.description: get info about audio playback is in progress.

keyword.name: lin2mu
keyword.description: Convert audio data from linear singal to mu-law.

keyword.name: mu2lin
keyword.description: Convert audio data from mu-law to linear signal.

keyword.name: playblocking
keyword.description: Plays an audioplayer object with blocking.

keyword.name: sound
keyword.description: Convert matrix of signal data to sound and play it.

keyword.name: soundsc
keyword.description: Scale data and play as sound.
